meanings.sent1: The pinocytotic process helps cells take in nutrients.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the pinocytotic behavior of the cells.
meanings.sent3: The pinocytotic dance of the molecules was quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: Her curiosity was like a pinocytotic sponge, absorbing all information around her.
meanings.sent5: The pinocytotic nature of the cell membrane was crucial for its function.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the process of pinocytosis.
meanings.sent1: The pinocytotic cells were actively absorbing substances.
meanings.sent2: The pinocytotic nature of the membrane allowed for nutrient intake.
meanings.sent3: The pinocytotic party of molecules was a sight to see.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like a pinocytotic mechanism, constantly taking in new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The pinocytotic behavior of the cells was essential for their survival.
